meanings.sent1: She outthrusted her hand to grab the falling book.
meanings.sent2: The athlete outthrusted his opponent to reach the finish line first.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel outthrusted its paw to snatch the acorn before the bird could get it.
meanings.sent4: The sun outthrusted the clouds, shining brightly in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The rocket outthrusted the gravitational pull, soaring into space.

meanings.sent1: The knight outthrusted his sword, defeating the dragon with a swift strike.
meanings.sent2: The new engine design outthrusted the previous model in power and efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The chef outthrusted all others in chopping speed, impressing the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outthrusted any obstacles in her path to success.
meanings.sent5: The waterfall outthrusted all other natural wonders, captivating visitors with its beauty.
